channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- HTML2WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- HTML2WP

item.title: CVE-2022-1572|2024-08-03T00:10:03.642Z -- unknown -- html2wp
item.description: The HTML2WP WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks in an AJAX action, available to any authenticated users such as subscriber, which could allow them to delete arbitrary file

item.title: CVE-2022-1574|2024-08-03T00:10:03.721Z -- unknown -- html2wp
item.description: The HTML2WP WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks when importing files, and does not validate them, as a result, unauthenticated attackers can upload arbitrary files (such as PHP) on the remote server

item.title: CVE-2022-1573|2024-08-03T00:10:03.374Z -- unknown -- html2wp
item.description: The HTML2WP WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them
